ayas.text: alif lām mīm
ghulibatir rūm
fī adnal-arḍi wahum min ba`di ghalabihim sayaghlibūn
fī biḍ`i sinīn ۗ lillāhil-amru min qablu wa min ba`d ۚ wayawma-idhiy yafraḥul mu-minūn
binaṣrillāh ۚ yanṣuru man yashā-u ۖ wahuwal `azīzur raḥīm
wa`dallāh ۖ lā yukhlifullāhu wa`dahu walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
ya`lamūna ẓāhiran minal ḥayātid dunyā wahum `anil-ākhirati hum ghāfilūn
awalam yatafakkarū fī anfusihim ۗ mā khalaqallāhus samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā illā bil ḥaqqi wa-ajalin musammā ۗ wa inna kathīran minan nāsi biliqā-i rabbihim lakāfirūn

awalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul ladhīna min qablihim ۚ kānū ashadda minhum quwwatan wa-athārul-arḍa wa`amarūhā akthara mimmā `amarūhā wajā-at hum rusuluhum bil bayyināt ۖ famā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn
thumma kāna `āqibatal ladhīna asā-us sū-ā an kadhhabū bi-āyātillāhi wakānū bihā yastahzi-ūn
allāhu yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduhu thumma ilayhi turja`ūn
wayawma taqūmus sā`atu yublisul mujrimūn
walam yakun lahum min shurakā-ihim shufa`ā-u wakānū bishurakā-ihim kāfirīn
wayawma taqūmus sā`atu yawma-idhiy yatafarraqūn
fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥbarūn
wa-ammal ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū bi-āyātinā waliqā-il-ākhirati fa-ulā-ika fil `adhābi muḥḍarūn
fasubḥānallāhi ḥīna tumsūna waḥīna tuṣbiḥūn
walahul ḥamdu fis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa`ashiyyan waḥīna tuẓhirūn
yukhrijul ḥayya minal mayyiti wayukhrijul mayyita minal ḥayyi wayuḥyil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā ۚ wakadhālika tukhrajūn
wa min āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūn
wa min āyātihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwājal litaskunū ilayhā waja`ala baynakum mawaddatan waraḥmah ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn
wa min āyātihi khalqus samāwāti wal-arḍi wakhtilāfu alsinatikum wa-alwānikum ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin lil`ālimīn
wa min āyātihi manāmukum bil layli wan nahāri wabtighā-ukum min faḍlih ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yasma`ūn
wa min āyātihi yurīkumul barqa khawfan waṭama`an wayunazzilu minas samā-i mā-an fayuḥyī bihil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy ya`qilūn
wa min āyātihi an taqūmas samā-u wal-arḍu bi-amrih ۚ thumma idhā da`ākum da`watan minal-arḍi idhā antum takhrujūn
walahu man fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ kullul lahu qānitūn
wahuwal ladhī yabda-ul khalqa thumma yu`īduhu wahuwa ahwanu `alayh ۚ walahul mathalul-a`lā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm

ḍaraba lakum mathalan min anfusikum ۖ hal lakum min mā malakat aymānukum min shurakā-a fī mā razaqnākum fa-antum fīhi sawā-un takhāfūnahum kakhīfatikum anfusakum ۚ kadhālika nufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqawmiy ya`qilūn
balit-taba`al ladhīna ẓalamū ahwā-ahum bighayri `il-m ۖ faman yahdī man aḍallallāh ۖ wa mā lahum min nāṣirīn
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfā ۚ fiṭratallāhil latī faṭaran nāsa `alayhā ۚ lā tabdīla likhalqillāh ۚ dhālikad dīnul qayyimu walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
munībīna ilayhi wattaqūhu wa-aqīmuṣ ṣalāta walā takūnū minal mushrikīn
minal ladhīna farraqū dīnahum wakānū shiya`ā ۖ kullu ḥizbin bimā ladayhim fariḥūn
wa idhā massan nāsa ḍurrun da`aw rabbahum munībīna ilayhi thumma idhā adhāqahum minhu raḥmatan idhā farīqun minhum birabbihim yushrikūn
liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum ۚ fatamatta`ū fasawfa ta`lamūn
am anzalnā `alayhim sulṭānan fahuwa yatakallamu bimā kānū bihi yushrikūn
wa idhā adhaqnan nāsa raḥmatan fariḥū bihā ۖ wa in tuṣibhum sayyi-atun bimā qaddamat aydīhim idhā hum yaqnaṭūn
awalam yaraw annallāha yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn
fa-āti dhal qurbā ḥaqqahu wal miskīna wabnas sabīl ۚ dhālika khayrul lilladhīna yurīdūna wajhallāh ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn
wa mā ātaytum min ribal liyarbuwa fī amwālin nāsi falā yarbū `indallāh ۖ wa mā ātaytum min zakātin turīdūna wajhallāhi fa-ulā-ika humul muḍ`ifūn
allāhul ladhī khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥyīkum ۖ hal min shurakā-ikum man yaf`alu min dhālikum min shay-ī ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn
ẓaharal fasādu fil barri wal baḥri bimā kasabat aydin nāsi liyudhīqahum ba`ḍal ladhī `amilū la`allahum yarji`ūn
qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul ladhīna min qabl ۚ kāna aktharuhum mushrikīn
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddīnil qayyimi min qabli an ya-tiya yawmul lā maradda lahu minallāh ۖ yawma-idhiy yaṣṣadda`ūn
man kafara fa`alayhi kufruh ۖ wa man `amila ṣāliḥan fali-anfusihim yamhadūn
liyajziyal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti min faḍlih ۚ innahu lā yuḥibbul kāfirīn
wa min āyātihi an yursilar riyāḥa mubashhirātin waliyudhīqakum min raḥmatihi walitajriyal fulku bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi wala`allakum tashkurūn
walaqad arsalnā min qablika rusulan ilā qawmihim fajā-ūhum bil bayyināti fantaqamnā minal ladhīna ajramū ۖ wakāna ḥaqqan `alaynā naṣrul mu-minīn

allāhul ladhī yursilur riyāḥa fatuthīru saḥāban fayabsuṭuhu fis samā-i kayfa yashā-u wayaj`aluhu kisafan fataral wadqa yakhruju min khilālih ۖ fa-idhā aṣāba bihi man yashā-u min `ibādihi idhā hum yastabshirūn
wa in kānū min qabli an yunazzala `alayhim min qablihi lamublisīn
fanẓur ilā āthāri raḥmatillāhi kayfa yuḥyil-arḍa ba`da mawtihā ۚ inna dhālika lamuḥyil mawtā ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
wala-in arsalnā rīḥan fara-awhu muṣfarral laẓallū min ba`dihi yakfurūn
fa-innaka lā tusmi`ul mawtā walā tusmi`uṣ ṣummad du`ā-a idhā wallaw mudbirīn
wa mā anta bihādil `umyi `an ḍalālatihim ۖ in tusmi`u illā man yu-minu bi-āyātinā fahum muslimūn
allāhul ladhī khalaqakum min ḍa`fin thumma ja`ala min ba`di ḍa`fin quwwatan thumma ja`ala min ba`di quwwatin ḍa`fan washaybah ۚ yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۖ wahuwal `alīmul qadīr
wayawma taqūmus sā`atu yuqsimul mujrimūna mā labithū ghayra sā`ah ۚ kadhālika kānū yu-fakūn
waqālal ladhīna ūtul `il-ma wal-iymāna laqad labithtum fī kitābillāhi ilā yawmil ba`th ۖ fahādhā yawmul ba`thi walākinnakum kuntum lā ta`lamūn
fayawma-idhin lā yanfa`ul ladhīna ẓalamū ma`dhiratuhum walā hum yusta`tabūn
walaqad ḍarabnā linnāsi fī hādhal qur-āni min kulli mathal ۚ wala-in ji-tahum bi-āyatin layaqūlannal ladhīna kafarū in antum illā mubṭilūn
kadhālika yaṭba`ullāhu `alā qulūbil ladhīna lā ya`lamūn
faṣbir inna wa`dallāhi ḥaqq ۖ walā yastakhiffannakal ladhīna lā yūqinūn
